tasks.label: Build
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && source submodules/emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && emcmake cmake .. && cmake --build .

windows.command: (if not exist build mkdir build) && submodules\emsdk\emsdk.bat activate latest && cd build && emcmake cmake .. && cmake --build .
submodules\emsdk\emsdk.bat activate latest && emrun --browser chrome --port 8000 build\source\hello-emscripten.html
